result.purpose: Contains the main source files for the web application, including styles and type definitions.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture, organizing styles and type definitions separately to maintain clarity and reusability.

src/App.css.purpose: Styles for a web application, including layout, animations, and theming.

src/index.css.purpose: Styling for a web application, including utility classes and responsive design.
side_effects: Applies styles based on color scheme preference

src/vite-env.d.ts.purpose: Defines TypeScript types for Vite client environment.
